Text.val: Author: Christian Overhoff
Creation: 2005
This modul creates an RTF-file, that can be loaded to an RTF-Blob later.
The file contains all invoices and remarks of a debtor.
The file itself is created by output merge operations from a pattern file.
This task just gets the filenames according the settings in the logical names.
08.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
30.10.2012 AS SCR#17631 removed merge of temp. RTF and replaced by generating doc with OLE automation
24.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (DUNH)
15.03.2010 AS SCR#16289 replaced RTF Edit control by ActiveX (Web Browser)
12.10.2010 SH SCR15871 Added Event 'Begin field" where Blob is shown
15.09.2009 AS removed usage FLTEMPI
14.11.2008 GB SCR14092 Added task GetAndSaveWindowPosition
09.05.2006 CO SCR11198 corrected windows title name display
also changed DEBC and DEBH from write to read access
08.05.2006 CO SCR11190 Extended the size of a single text line from 400 to 4096
Gets Path from general table in the task prefix:
Source for "NotesPattern.rtf":
local and user specific destination for merged notes text file:
Get source path for Blob-file-pattern 'NotesPattern.rtf':
Get Button description:
-- Get window position
Delete empty window record, just in case:
Create Word document with remarks from DUNH ...
Quit Word, no longer needed and avoids locks on the file ...
-- Save window position
This task prepares the DUNH_REMARK to be shown
as a combined big textfield.
Magic SQL Range: action = TEL or RIS or MBV:
This link seems to be unnecessary, cause it links to the main record itself,
just to get the remark-field. BUT: IT IS A WORKAROUND!
Taking the remark field, which is a Blob-Type, directly from the main record,
leads to an SQL-error, unless this task would open a transaction!
The link gets the blob WITHOUT the need of a transaction!
Create (add) new document from template ....
Insert document header (format := "Heading 1") ...
save the document we created to temporary file ...
Insert remark header (format := "Heading 2") ...
Insert remark text (format := "Normal") ...
-- set
-- get
This task prepares the DUNH_REMARK to be shown
as a combined big textfield.
Magic SQL Range: action = TEL or RIS or MBV:
This link seems to be unnecessary, cause it links to the main record itself,
just to get the remark-field. BUT: IT IS A WORKAROUND!
Taking the remark field, which is a Blob-Type, directly from the main record,
leads to an SQL-error, unless this task would open a transaction!
The link gets the blob WITHOUT the need of a transaction!
Updated in record suffix:
Empty text, if no records where found:
If last line is empty, than skip the line in the Blob-Text field,
because there is a blank line per default anyway and a additional
empty line from the original text would look ugly in the Blob-Text:
without a <CR> in the end, just take the original text:
For better performance, calculate the count only one time:
Default: let the window be open, when leaving:
Close Event is PROPAGETED! It Exists the task.
